benefits.title: Following are the benefits Non Life Insurance
benefits.subtitle: Benefits of Non Life Insurance

data.subtitle: 1. Financial security at the time of need is one of the major upsides of buying a non-life insurance policy.
2. The insurance company will bear the cost of a financial liability. Thus, such risks are carried over to the insurance company from the policyholder.
3. Peace of mind related to possible financial crises.
